As part of the process to review Elsevier journals at the University of Virginia, the Library has designed a survey for UVA affiliates. We would like to hear how you use specific Elsevier journal titles for instruction, research, and/or patient care. 

This survey will close on January 1. Please respond for yourself as an individual, not on behalf of a division or a department. You may review as many journals as you wish. 

You will be logged in through Netbadge after clicking the survey link below, and you can pause and return to the survey any time. 

 

Thanks for your interest, but the survey is now closed.
